MainPage.title: Welcome to Password challenge!
MainPage.rules: Rules are simple: Follow the instructions and create the password.

MainChallenge.title1: Your password must contain at least 5 characters
MainChallenge.description1: We are starting slowly, you can use any characters you want.
MainChallenge.title2: Add special characters to your password
MainChallenge.description2: Rules will be simple, from now on carry on with your already created password and add any requested characters to pass the challenge. Now you can use any characters you want.
